price: 一切赞颂，全归安拉！他创造天和地，造化了重重黑暗和光明；不信道的人，却以物配主。
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَجَعَلَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ وَٱلنُّورَۖ ثُمَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ يَعۡدِلُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wajaʿala al-ẓulumāti wal-nūra thumma alladhīna kafarū birabbihim yaʿdilūna
